description: This file defines a Kotlin class MapFragment which extends Fragment. It manages a map UI component, including View binding setup and setting some placeholder text in its views when created.

classes.name: MapFragment
classes.description: A Fragment managing the map UI, setting up view bindings and placeholder text.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout for the fragment and initializes view binding.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets the text for various views within the fragment after the view has been created.

methods.name: onDestroyView
methods.description: Clears the view binding reference when the view is destroyed.
